title: Is 78 too old to still do karaoke? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, and why would it be? If you couldn’t sing when you were younger, it probably hasn’t gotten any better, and if you could before, you probably still can (with some age-related vocal deterioration). If you’re enjoying this hobby with your contemporaries, look at it this way, they probably can’t even hear you that well, anyway!
